title: Reformed unban me pls
body:
I talked to a rioter and he told me to come here to attempt to get an additional chance.

Let me start this off my saying, riots punishment system is bad. By banning people permanently for talking doesn't make sense, when riot could easily just chat restrict them indefinitely or shadow mute them, making their teammates unable to see what they're saying. This would actually help player retention as well as help riot be a nice safe space for gamers :) 

In my situation, I was permabanned for saying the f word (new f word), but had never been chat restricted. I got banned for homophobic language, but everyone who's played videogames for the past 5 years knows this word isn't meant in a homophobic manner. It's literally just people attempting to offend someone who has provoked them. 

Now, I'm okay with riot not wanting people to say it, but if that's their goal, why not just perma-chat restrict people???? This is like someone having gangrene in their foot, but instead of amputating just the foot, cutting off their whole leg. I dont understand what riot gains from permabanning players, that wouldn't be accomplished by just perma chat restricting them. 

Other than that, please unban me !! "  :))))

Instead you come here and say the system sucks and what you didn't wasn't wrong . Personally as someone who happens to relate to that word I don't really enjoy hearing it in game...it is a hate word simple fact.

If you called someone a homophobic slur or some variation of it, then I do think a punishment was necessary.

If you hadn't received a punishment previously, then you normally get a 2-week ban; however, there are cases where a single offense is escalated to a permanent ban. That's pretty rare though.
